------------------------------------------------

.. include:: include_data_collection_plus_local_upgrade.rst

Original sources
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Cummings JL et al. (1994). The Neuropsychiatric Inventory: comprehensive
  assessment of psychopathology in dementia. Neurology 44: 2308.
  http://www.pubmed.gov/7991117.

- Kaufer DL et al. (2000). Validation of the NPI-Q, a brief clinical form of
  the Neuropsychiatric Inventory. J Neuropsych Clin Neurosci 12: 233.
  http://www.pubmed.gov/11001602.

- http://npitest.net/

- http://download.lww.com/wolterskluwer_vitalstream_com/PermaLink/CONT/A/CONT_21_3_2015_02_26_KAUFER_2015-10_SDC2.pdf

- http://www.ftlda.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/FTLDA-NEUROPSYCHIATRIC-INVENTORY-QUESTIONNAIRE.pdf
